desc: Official Planika distributors in the UK. Planika offers the safest, most technologically advanced and easy to use bio ethanol ventless and flueless fires. We have a range of indoor and outdoor fires. Ethanol fuel, gas fires, and expert customer advice all under one roof. Price match guarantee.

layout.text: From bestselling gas heaters, to flueless bioethanol fireplaces, Planika brings fire to every space.
